messages.subject: Re: Fw: [coreknowledge] Virus alert
messages.msgSnippet: Please don t forward these alerts to mailing lists, especially without checking to see if the information is accurate. This Wobbler thing is a hoax. For more
messages.messageBody:
Please don't forward these "alerts" to mailing lists, especially without checking to see if the information is accurate. This Wobbler thing is a hoax. For more information: http://www.symantec.com/avcenter/venc/data/wobbler-hoax.html

Forwarding this misinformation just clogs up the net, makes mailing lists a real drag, and unnecessarily alarms unsuspecting readers. It also rewards the hoaxers with publicity.

Check for hoaxes at http://www.symantec.com/avcenter/hoax.html (there are other sites as well; but this is the one I have bookmarked).

Laura Bush
laura@...
http://www.honeypot-hollow.com
----- Original Message -----
From: Sandy Kent
To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com ; preschoolhomescool@onelist.com ; preandkinderhsing@onelist.com ; homeschooling_preK-K@onelist.com ; unschooling@onelist.com ; RUL@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 2:29 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: [coreknowledge] Virus alert


I got this from another list.

Sandy


----- Original Message -----
From: Karen & David Hoogland
To: Undisclosed Recipients
Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 4:58 AM
Subject: [coreknowledge] Virus alert


From: "Karen & David Hoogland" <kdhoogland@...>

I am not sure if this is true, but I suppose you cannot be too careful!!


Subject: VIRUS ALERT!!!

Read below to receive further information concerning this virus
alert.
=20
We have been informed of a new virus - WOBBLER.
It will arrive on e-mail titled CALIFORNIA
IBM and AOL have announced that it is very powerful, more so
than Melissa, there is no remedy. It will eat all your information on
the
hard drive and also destroys Netscape Navigator and Microsoft
Internet
Explorer.
Do not open anything with this title and please pass this message on
to
all your contacts and anyone who uses your e-mail facility. Not many
people seem to know about this yet so propagate it as fast as
possible.




------------------------------------------
Karen and David Hoogland ?


________________________________________________________
